BayesSpace 0.1.0

Reference

All functions

addPCA()

Add PCA output to a SingleCellExperiment

enhanceFeatures()

Predict log-normalized expression vectors from deconvolved PCs using linear regression.

exampleSCE()

Create minimal SingleCellExperiment for documentation examples.

getRDS()

Download a processed sample from our S3 bucket

mcmcChain() removeChain()

Read MCMC chain associated with a BayesSpace clustering or enhancement

qPlot() qTune()

Tuning the choice of q (number of clusters) before running spatialCluster

runGenesetPCA()

Run 'blocked' PCA on HVGs and gene sets of interest

spatialCluster()

Spatial clustering

spatialEnhance()

Enhance spot resolution

clusterPlot() enhancePlot()

Plot cluster labels in spatial context
